topics.title: Ovulation
topics.description: The star of the show! Let's figure out when during your cycle you can get pregnant.

modalContent.content: Get to know your fertile window! This is the most important one. Conception can only happen during your fertile window - 5 days before, day of ovulation, and up to 5 days after you ovulate. Talk to RosaGPT to discover which of the many options out there might work best for you.

Support your liver after coming off of BC because BC does tax your liver. Liver detox requires a lot of nutrients and we want to support your body in this - you can do this very cheaply or for free such as: dry brushing, sweating, sweating in a sauna and more. Talk to RosaGPT to find some practices that will work best for you.

checklistItems.title: If 6 months before TTC, consider prenatal

modalContent.content: BC depletes nutrients, let's build back up. ALSO want to have good nutrient status to grow a baby!

topics.title: Nutrition
topics.description: Simple Preconception Diet focuses on two things: Blood sugar balance and anti-inflammatory foods.

checklistItems.title: Blood sugar balance: eat consistently 3-5 hours

modalContent.content: Why blood sugar balance is important to fertility cortisol, insulin egg quality etc

checklistItems.title: Blood sugar balance: eat breakfast, 30 mins waking

modalContent.content: Why blood sugar balance is important to fertility cortisol, insulin egg quality

checklistItems.title: Half plate veggies. ¼ plate quality protein, ¼ plate complex carbohydrate foods. Serving of healthy fat.

modalContent.content: Eating this way will provide you with all the necessary nutrients you need. RosaGPT can share some simple meal plans with you if you need some help getting started.

checklistItems.title: Add in Anti-inflammatory foods every week.

modalContent.content: for a healthy diet and healthy preconception, include a few servings a week: fermented foods, nuts, vitamin A rich foods like liver and fish eggs, omega-3 rich foods like fatty fish, chicken or beef stock.
